credit_line: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
title: Dog in Feathered Hat and Ruffled Collar
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
description: In the shape of a seated dog with ruffled collar and feathered hat, inscribed on band on reverse side of hat "Rd.1465"(?- illegible impression). Lid opens at bottom, hinge on side above tail. Striker recessed in bottom.
name: Matchsafe
